memberdef.name: _MPRINTF_REPLACE
memberdef.initializer: /* we want curl-functions instead of native ones */

memberdef.name: replacements
memberdef.initializer: ={ {"url_effective", VAR_EFFECTIVE_URL}, {"http_code", VAR_HTTP_CODE}, {"time_total", VAR_TOTAL_TIME}, {"time_namelookup", VAR_NAMELOOKUP_TIME}, {"time_connect", VAR_CONNECT_TIME}, {"time_pretransfer", VAR_PRETRANSFER_TIME}, {"time_starttransfer", VAR_STARTTRANSFER_TIME}, {"size_header", VAR_HEADER_SIZE}, {"size_request", VAR_REQUEST_SIZE}, {"size_download", VAR_SIZE_DOWNLOAD}, {"size_upload", VAR_SIZE_UPLOAD}, {"speed_download", VAR_SPEED_DOWNLOAD}, {"speed_upload", VAR_SPEED_UPLOAD}, {"content_type", VAR_CONTENT_TYPE}, {NULL, VAR_NONE} }
